scripts.docker:run: docker run --rm --platform linux/amd64 --network host -e CI -v "$(pwd)/..:/work" elm-playwright bash -c
scripts.test: npm run docker:run 'ln -sf /deps/node_modules /work/node_modules && cd app && npx playwright test'
scripts.test:update-snapshots: npm run docker:run 'ln -sf /deps/node_modules /work/node_modules && cd app && npx playwright test --update-snapshots'
